location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham, The Secretary to Government, Secret Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of letter No.51 regarding suggested measures by the Superintendent of Marine in order to obtain reparation for the plunder of the Brig Mary Annewhich had occured at the port of Burbuna (on the Gulf of Aden), and concerns that the vessels required for this would leave the Marine Force in the Gulf with only two vessels.
